Text: The Church of the Guanche People (Spanish: "Iglesia del Pueblo Guanche" ) is a religious organisation, founded in 2001 in the city of San Cristóbal de La Laguna (Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain).
Triplets:<The Church of the Guanche People
The Church of the Guanche People
1:
--------------------
Text: Church of the Guanche People:  It aims to perpetuate and spread the pagan religion of the ancient Guanche people.
